titleStmt.title: The new pope: or, a true account of the ceremonies and proceedings in the conclave at Rome, upon the Pope's death, for the election of a new pope, according to the constitutions and ceremonials. As also the coronation and cavalcade. Translated out of the French by J.D.
Ceremoniale historico e politico. Part 5. English
titleStmt.author: Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.

titleStmt.title: The new pope: or, a true account of the ceremonies and proceedings in the conclave at Rome, upon the Pope's death, for the election of a new pope, according to the constitutions and ceremonials. As also the coronation and cavalcade. Translated out of the French by J.D.
Ceremoniale historico e politico. Part 5. English
titleStmt.author: Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.
Davies, John, 1625-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold at the George in Fleet street, near Cliffords-Inne,

notesStmt.note: "Translated from a French version of an unidentified work by Gregorio Leti which was subsequently incorporated in pt. 5 of his "'Il Ceremoniale historico, e politico.'"--BM.
Includes "A catalogue of the names, surnames and dignities of the cardinals at the elections of Clement IX. May 1667" (p. 95-102).
A reissue, with cancel title page and no additional preliminaries, of the edition with title "The ceremonies of the vacant see", published in 1671 (Wing L1330C).
Item at 797:5 identified as Wing N716 (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproductions of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
